LanguageData.ResearchAdvancedBridge.label: advanced bridges
LanguageData.ResearchAdvancedBridge.description: Allows colonists to build metallic and stone bridges on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh). They are more efficient than basic bridge.
LanguageData.ResearchAdvancedSlide.label: advanced slide
LanguageData.ResearchAdvancedSlide.description: Advanced slide has special mechanisms to walk really fast, better than other slides.
LanguageData.ResearchBasicSlide.label: sliding floor
LanguageData.ResearchBasicSlide.description:
Allows colonists to drop different stuffs on floor to better walk speed. It's fast to build and don't require much resources but deteriorate over time.
Not much useful on mud or marsh.
LanguageData.ResearchFlagstoneRoad.label: flagstone road
LanguageData.ResearchFlagstoneRoad.description: Road built from chunks, much more efficient than simple roads.
LanguageData.ResearchFoundationHeavy.label: heavy foundation
LanguageData.ResearchFoundationHeavy.description: Build foundations on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh) to set support to heavy builds.
LanguageData.ResearchFoundationLight.label: light foundation
LanguageData.ResearchFoundationLight.description: Build foundations on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh) to set support to light builds (especially to improve the walk speed of bridges).
LanguageData.ResearchIndoorSoil.label: indoor soil
LanguageData.ResearchIndoorSoil.description:
Allows colonists to place a very simple soil on floors to slowly grow crops indoors.
Needs potatoes to be placed.
LanguageData.ResearchLandFill.label: land fill
LanguageData.ResearchLandFill.description: The basic to change the hostile terrain around you. This unlocks basic bridges, primitive soil, neutral soil and other research projects like flagstone road and super rich soil.
LanguageData.ResearchPoweredBridge.label: powered bridge
LanguageData.ResearchPoweredBridge.description: Powered bridge has special mechanisms to walk really fast, better than other bridges.
LanguageData.ResearchSimpleRoad.label: simple road
LanguageData.ResearchSimpleRoad.description: Allows colonists to build a simple road on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh) to efficient walk.
LanguageData.ResearchSuperRichSoil.label: super rich soil
LanguageData.ResearchSuperRichSoil.description:
Allows colonists to place super rich soil directly on unstable terrains (water, mud and marsh). It's the most growable soil of the galaxy.
Needs corn and devilstrand to be placed.
LanguageData.ResearchWaterDeep.label: water deep
LanguageData.ResearchWaterDeep.description: Transform a existent unstable terrain (water, mud and marsh) on deep water. Not so deep like natural deep water but hard to walk. Very useful to slow down enemies but require a lot of work.
LanguageData.ResearchWaterShallow.label: water shallow
LanguageData.ResearchWaterShallow.description: Allows colonists to drop water on diggable terrains until form passable shallow water. Useful to set up soils or slow down enemies but require a lot of work.
